channel.title: Goals on Non-volatile Memory
channel.description: Recent content in Goals on Non-volatile Memory

item.title: Goals
item.description: One of my goals for 2019 is to grow occupationally through increased confidence. The way I’ve chosen to tackle this goal is through intentional, periodic publication of my thoughts and ideas on this website. By doing this, I hope to achieve better balance between learning new things (which I love to do), and sharing what I have learned publicly. This should help increase my confidence as I shed my worries about saying the wrong thing, or saying it the the wrong way.
